hotels.title: Beachfront Mauritius Hideaway with Poolside Bar
hotels.description: Traditional Mauritian culture blends seamlessly with modern conveniences at the InterContinental Resort Mauritius, an IHG Hotel, a fun-filled resort perfect for couples or families looking for a tropical escape. Spend balmy days in the crystalline seawater, or install yourself by the pool at Sugar Cane beach bar and enjoy light meals and signature sunset cocktails in a casual seaside setting. In between island adventures, head to the spa for a relaxing sauna session or massage treatment.
